description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 14 April 2020 (RN 19/09994/FULL) which itself varied condition 1 of planning permission dated 29th April 2016 (RN: 15/10367/FULL) for 'Demolition and redevelopment behind retained front and part facades as well as the demolition and reconstruction of mews properties to create two single family dwelling houses. Associated alterations and extensions include subterranean basements, which will extend beneath the mews; re-instatement of the party wall in the rear courtyard; re-instatement of entrance to no.108; rear lower ground floor extensions partially infilling the rear courtyard and with roof terraces above; construction of full height closet wing extensions; reconstruction of mansard roof extension; installation of mechanical plant; and internal alterations on all floor levels (Site includes nos. 107 - 108 Eaton Square and nos. 107 - 108 Eccleston Mews) (as amended by RN: 20/00069/NMA). Namely, to allow minor amendments including a reduction in size of the basement extension (omission of the basement beneath the main house of both properties), alterations to the appearance of the building including retention of parts of the rear elevation and changes to the lower ground floor courtyard fenestration, and internal changes from RN 19/09994/FULL, NAMELY, to vary the approved drawing numbers to amend the roof of the lower ground floor link to form a roof terrace, alteration to to the lower ground floor fenestration, change to the new rear outrigger fenestration detail and internal changes to the main houses (linked to 21/02406/LBC).
